EmailTemplate.description: Use to promote the Outlook Toolbar to end users of GM Web
EmailTemplate.name: GlobalMeet-Outlook Toolbar for Web Users
EmailTemplate.subject: Need a faster way to schedule meetings?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
http://www.pgi.com
YOU'RE BUSY, SO WE MADE MEETING SIMPLE Start & schedule your meetings directly from your Outlook Toolbar
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Now you can stop spending time trying to schedule your meeting and spend more time collaborating. GlobalMeet's Outlook Toolbar lets you launch or schedule meetings while checking your emails – its that easy.
What you get with your Outlook Toolbar:
- Start and schedule meetings directly from Outlook - Meeting detailswill be automatically included in your email invitation– so there is no extra work for you -Join the meeting in a single click with GlobalMeet's Connect Me feature
To get your Outlook Toolbar
Simply DOWNLOAD HERE and use your Client ID and Password to activate.
Have Questions?
I'm more than happy to answer any questions you may have.
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
http://www.pgi.com
